data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Voodoo was the name that has always been used to describe this
    package amoung the people that haved used it. It is also the name
    that the copyright paperwork is under. Since it operates in
    mod_perl, and rather that create a top level package space,
    Apache::Voodoo seemed like an apropriate place.
